comments.author: Robert Muir
comments.body:
looks like the bug still exists, so we need the hack. 

ill see if i can make another test case

comments.author: Robert Muir
comments.body: my original test case submitted to ICU (http://bugs.icu-project.org/trac/ticket/8734) still fails, so this is still broken. I will add back the hack to lucenetestcase and let them know.

comments.author: Robert Muir
comments.body: we upgraded, unfortunately we still have the hack.

description: This bug fix release fixes problems with icu under java7: http://bugs.icu-project.org/trac/ticket/8734
summary: upgrade icu jar to 4.8.1.1 / remove lucenetestcase hack
